channel.title: Corrupted (Neutral Killer or Offensive)
channel.description:
Corrupted (Neutral Killer or Offensive)
Passive: Corrupted Skin: Immune to death at night. Corrupt anybody who visits you.
Passive: Corrupted Essence: Immune to corruption
Goal: Survive
Notes: You are not notified if you are corrupted. You will die the next night, and anybody you visit will also corrupt anybody you visit. I had an odd idea of a passively harmful person who needed to survive. Not sure how if it would hold up, but the idea fascinates me.

item.title: Corrupted (Neutral Killer or Offensive)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Then just sit there and watch everyone die. Point being he is too easy.

Read full topic

item.title: Corrupted (Neutral Killer or Offensive)
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
But isn’t that also the perfect evil claim if no one will visit you? People will get that possibility. Also you could executed, even if you are, because of the “Neuts Out” philosophy.

Read full topic

item.title: Corrupted (Neutral Killer or Offensive)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Just claim and no one will bother you.
